nodes.label: welcome
utterances: Welcome to AutoCare Service Center! How can I help you today?

nodes.label: request_car_info
utterances: Could you please provide your car's make, model and year?

nodes.label: ask_service_type
utterances: What type of service do you need? We offer diagnostics, repairs, and routine maintenance.

nodes.label: check_schedule
utterances: Let me check our available time slots for this service.

nodes.label: offer_times
utterances: We have slots available tomorrow at 10 AM or Friday at 2 PM. Which would you prefer?

nodes.label: suggest_urgent
utterances: I notice this is a critical repair. We have an urgent slot available today at 4 PM with a 20% rush fee. Would you like this option, or prefer a regular appointment next week?

nodes.label: confirm_appointment
utterances: I've scheduled your appointment. Would you like to add any additional services while your car is here?

nodes.label: suggest_additional
utterances: While your car is here, we recommend an oil change and filter replacement. Would you like to add these services?

nodes.label: provide_estimate
utterances: The estimated cost for all services will be $X. Would you like to proceed with the appointment?

nodes.label: end
utterances: Your appointment is confirmed. We'll see you then. Have a great day!
I need to schedule a car service
I have a 2020 Toyota Camry
I need brake repair
I need an oil change instead
Okay, please check availability
Alright, what are my options?
Friday at 2 PM works for me
Yes, I'll take the urgent slot
No, I'll take a regular appointment
What other services would you recommend?
No additional services needed
Yes, add the oil change please
No, just the original service
Actually, I'd like to change the service type
Yes, that works for me

messages.text: Welcome to AutoCare Service Center! How can I help you today?
I need to schedule a car service
Could you please provide your car's make, model and year?
I have a 2020 Toyota Camry
What type of service do you need? We offer diagnostics, repairs, and routine maintenance.
I need brake repair
Let me check our available time slots for this service.
Alright, what are my options?
I notice this is a critical repair. We have an urgent slot available today at 4 PM with a 20% rush fee. Would you like this option, or prefer a regular appointment next week?
No, I'll take a regular appointment
We have slots available tomorrow at 10 AM or Friday at 2 PM. Which would you prefer?
Friday at 2 PM works for me
I've scheduled your appointment. Would you like to add any additional services while your car is here?
No additional services needed
The estimated cost for all services will be $X. Would you like to proceed with the appointment?
Yes, that works for me
Your appointment is confirmed. We'll see you then. Have a great day!

Your appointment is confirmed. We'll see you then. Have a great day!
